sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { GlobalVariables, Categories, Posts } from 'src/app/app.globals'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'home-panel', templateUrl: './home-panel.html', styleUrls: ['./home-panel.css'] }) export class HomePanelComponent { public categories: Categories[] = [] public posts: Posts[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { http.get(GlobalVariables.getAllCategoriesApiUrl).subscribe(data => { this.categories = data; }, error => console.log(error)); } onClickSubmit(data: { categoryFK: any }) { this.http.get(GlobalVariables.getAllPostsByCategorie + data.categoryFK).subscribe(res => { this.posts = res; }, error => console.log(error)); } }

{{ post.title }}

{{ post.description | slice: 0:500}}...

Category: {{ post.categorie }}

Date release/update: {{ post.date }}
